ARABIC: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'I do not ask you for any wage for it, nor am I a man of false pretensions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "I do not ask any compensation of you for it, nor am I a specious pretender.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Prophet), tell them: “I do not ask you for any recompense for the performance of this task; nor am I given to affectation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), say, "I do not ask any reward for my preaching to you for I am not a pretender.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) “I do not ask any fee from you for the Qur’an, and I am not a fabricator.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "No wage do I ask of you for this, nor am I one of the Mutakallifin."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: I do not ask you for any reward for it; nor am I of those who affect:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'I ask of you no wage for it, neither am I of those who take things upon themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say (O Muhammad, unto mankind): I ask of you no fee for this, and I am no simulating.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "I do not ask you for any recompense for this, nor am I a man of false pretentions:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: ask of you for it no hire, nor am I of the affecters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘I do not ask you any reward for it, and I am no impostor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "No reward do I ask of you for this (Qur'an), nor am I a pretender.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "No wage do I ask of you for this (the Quran), nor am I one of the Mutakallifun (those who pretend and fabricate things which do not exist).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say (Prophet Muhammad): 'For this I ask of you no wage, and I am not of those who take things upon themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “I ask of you no wage for this, and I am not a pretender.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, [O Muhammad], "I do not ask you for the Qur'an any payment, and I am not of the pretentious
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:86] Say: ‘I do not ask of you, in return for this, for delivering the Message [to you], any reward, any fee; nor am I an impostor, so as to make up the Qur’ān myself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) Muhammad, to the people of Mecca: (I ask of you no fee) no payment or provision (for this) for belief in Allah's divine Oneness and in the Qur'an, (and I am no impostor) and I am not inventing anything.
